programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Master builder Tommy Walsh, together with expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards help real people make real home improvements, whatever the budget. Get smart, practical tips on home improvements that make your space work better for you.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38
programme.desc: This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38
programme.desc: This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Rituals
programme.desc: In every culture, our rituals reveal what it means to be human. They allow us to express our identity, join us together and help us navigate through life. This visually stunning series uses cinematic filming techniques to immerse viewers in incredible rituals practised by cultures across the globe, from the cities of Japan to the jungles of New Guinea. These surprising rituals touch on moments we all experience - from birth and death to marriage and funerals.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: Sparky thinks that she may be too boring for her friends, so she transforms into Sparkles her alter ego. Sparkles is everything that Sparky isn't. It's fun at first, but soon her friends miss Sparky and want her back. Later, Teddy Driver Meeks and Running Tizzy compete in an epic race to decide who is the fastest teddy in Teddytown. The race is on!

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Ice Explorers Hiccup and Sneeze are in Snow Land looking for the Abibinable Snow Woman. Along the way, penguins and a polar bear help point them in the right direction.

programme.title: School of Roars S1
programme.desc: Five little monsters go on all sorts of fun adventures at their school with the help of their kind teacher Miss Grizzlesniff!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S6
programme.desc: Tayo the Little Bus is about exciting adventures that are to happen in the metropolitan city where different vehicles live with harmony with one another.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S2 Spinoff
programme.desc: When Zari finds a baby bird in a nest that has fallen out of a tree, she accidentally leaves it on top of a car that drives off, prompting the rangers to launch a high-speed car chase to get the baby bird back.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: Super Wings S6: World Guardians
programme.desc: The Super Wings are upping their saving game with incredible new powers and equipment to become heroic protectors and defenders. They become World Guardians! Protecting environment, animals and human culture.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Blue and small, standing only three apples high, the Smurfs might be hard to tell apart at first. However, each Smurf is a distinct individual with his or her own personality, their names say it all!

programme.title: Spidey And His Amazing Friends S1
programme.desc: Follow Peter Parker, Gwen Stacy, and Miles Morales and their adventures as the young heroes team up with Hulk, Ms. Marvel, and Black Panther to take down foes like Rhino, Doc Oock, and Green Goblin.

programme.title: Geez, I Didn't Know That!
programme.desc: What do you do with laser speed guns at the water park ? To measure the speed of kids going down the slides of course! Join the Professor as he experiments with living subjects to achieve the best sliding position for the fastest speed.

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends Of Awesomeness S2
programme.desc: The further adventures of Po the Dragon Warrior and his friends.

programme.title: National STEM Championship 2022
programme.desc: The third quarter-final episode of the National STEM Championship sees six more schools vying for one of the 12 semi-final spots.

programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S28
programme.desc: With the prehistoric force of the dinosaurs, a new crew of Power Rangers must deal with a menacing army of alien creatures attacking Earth.

programme.title: Danger Mouse S1
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of secret agent Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven Ares
programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: When Jet and Adelaide realize they have too much work and reading to get through in one night, they devise a plan to slow time by taking Adelaide's flyer to the very edge of a black hole in order to slow down time.

programme.title: The Space Race
programme.desc: Reach for the stars with Show Commander Afro as he pilots you through The Space Race, the intergalactic game show testing contestants for their knowledge of space and their ingenuity in a series of challenging tasks. 12-teams, made up of a young captain and their first officer, vie to win a prize of a lifetime; a trip to New York to feel like a real-life astronaut in the ZERO-G Experience.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off: S3
programme.desc: The tent is up, the ovens preheated and some of Australia's best amateur bakers are ready to do battle in the return of the deliciously successful series. Twelve home baking enthusiasts don their aprons and line up behind the iconic Bake Off benches, drawing on every morsel of their baking prowess and creativity to tackle complex and mouth-watering challenges. Culinary icon Maggie Beer and acclaimed chef Matt Moran judge the bakers' efforts.
